html:
VITRA’S SMART FUNCTIONS ensure CLEAN AND INTUITIVE BATHROOMS

Engineered to support personal hygiene and comfort, VitrA’s bathroom solutions integrate smart functions with a user-oriented design approach. Multiple washing options, adjustable water temperature and pressure, and splash-free flushing systems are developed to work in sync, responding to everyday needs through precise functionality. These technological features contribute to bathroom environments that feel intuitive, clean, and thoughtfully composed.


VitrA designs bathrooms that support hygiene, comfort, and ease of use | all images courtesy of VitrA

BATHROOM DESIGN ROOTED IN TURKISH CRAFT

As one of the few global brands to design, develop, and manufacture all bathroom components in-house, VitrA carries a unique expertise, recognized with various design awards. Deeply influenced by Turkey’s ceramic traditions, VitrA reinterprets this rich heritage through an eco-conscious lens, delivering products that are both technologically advanced and culturally rooted.


VitrA’s product designs remain minimal, precise, and aligned with contemporary interiors

TECHNOLOGY-DRIVEN SOLUTIONS FOR MAXIMAL COMFORT AND HYGIENE

Among VitrA’s standout innovations is the V-Care 3 Smart Toilet, reflecting the brand’s focus on functionality, hygiene, and efficient water use. Its advanced features include multiple wash modes, adjustable water pressure and temperature, and intuitive controls, allowing for a personalized experience. The QuantumFlush technology optimizes water flow using the principles of laminar flow, distributing water powerfully yet silently across the bowl’s entire inner surface. The result is a thorough clean that avoids noise and splashing. Additionally, in high-use areas such as kitchens, VitrA’s hybrid faucets contribute to water conservation while supporting everyday hygiene. These designs balance technical performance with a clear, minimalist aesthetic.


VitrA’s QuantumFlush technology and Hybrid Faucets contribute to water conservation while supporting hygiene

Completing the brand’s offering, the VitrA Grid collection provides a flexible and refined design system. With three product segments spanning different price points and performance levels, it offers the ideal solution for both renovations and new builds. Each item reflects an internationally appealing aesthetic while staying true to VitrA’s principles of quality and design integrity.


VitrA Grid provides a flexible and refined design system
